pullRequest.title: [FLINK-19982][test] Change the log when CollectSinkFunction receives an invalid request from debug to info for future investigation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Brief change log

Change the log when CollectSinkFunction receives an invalid request from debug to info for future investigation of FLINK-19982.

Verifying this change
This change is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.

nodes.bodyText: How many these logs will there be? Will it flow the log file?
